suppress.notes: Temporarily suppress CVE-2022-38752. Reporting as false positive https://github.com/OSSIndex/vulns/issues/328 More info on the fix here https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml/issues/531/stackoverflow-oss-fuzz-47081
Suppress false positive of CVE-2021-37533 as we are manually overriding commons-net:3.9.0 which does not contain this vulnerability. The vulnerable jar is not part of final build.
